attributes.action: Reintroduce the British one pound note
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Bank of England Series D one pound note was discontinued in 1984, having been replaced by a pound coin the year before, and was officially withdrawn from circulation in 1988.

This petition is investigting the public opinion on this matter

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
